News

Introducing Grant Program: Innovating in the SPACE ID Ecosystem

The blockchain realm thrives on innovation. That’s why we’re excited to
announce the launch of the SPACE ID Grant Program, a long-term funding
initiative designed to support and enrich the blockchain community. Our goal
is to empower developers and entrepreneurs to launch innovative projects and
spread your visions with us. Through this program, we aim to facilitate the
growth of the blockchain community and advance the frontier of blockchain
technology.

May 09, 2023

Read

Join the Movement: Introducing SPACE ID DAO & $ID Token Buyback

SPACE ID is having its moment right now, showing no signs of slowing down.
What else could be a better time to take things up a notch? SPACE ID is
ambitiously building a next-gen universal name service network that belongs to
the community, and we’re now bolstering the governance via the creation of a
DAO and the $ID governance token. Introducing SPACE ID DAO, a community-driven
platform where amazing happens.

Apr 18, 2023

Read

From Beta to Better: the Full Release of SPACE ID 2.0 & Voyage Season 2 —
Striking

The world of Web3 is growing rapidly, and with it comes the need for a
reliable and efficient integrated platform to manage one’s digital identities
in one place. That’s where SPACE ID 2.0 comes in to fulfill its mission, as it
offers a level of convenience and ease of use that is unmatched by other
platforms. We mentioned before that all the SPACE ID 2.0 upgrades would be
gradually rolled out in multiple phases. Today, we are excited to announce the
arrival of the SPACE ID 2.0 official release. The beta version is now a thing
of the past, and let’s give its enhanced form a warm welcome.

Apr 04, 2023

Read

Introducing SPACE ID Token (ID), Landing on Binance Launchpad

We are thrilled to announce the launch of SPACE ID governance token — the ID
token, and its public release on Binance Launchpad. The preparation period of
Binance Launchpad subscription will start on March 17th, 2023, 00:00 UTC and
the token distribution will start from March 22nd, 2023, 10:00 (UTC).

Mar 16, 2023

Read
